mapper.select: SELECT article_no as articleNo, board_no as boardNo, user_no as userNo, category_no as categoryNo, title, content, reg_date as regDate, hit_count as hitCount, "group", step, "order" FROM Article WHERE board_no = 3 ORDER BY "group" desc, "order" asc

SELECT article_no as articleNo, board_no as boardNo, user_no as userNo, category_no as categoryNo, title, content, reg_date as regDate, hit_count as hitCount, "group", step, "order" FROM Article WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Article(article_no, board_no, user_no, category_no, title, content, reg_date, hit_count, "group", step, "order") VALUES (seq_Article.nextVal, 3, 1, #{categoryNo}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, seq_Article.currVal, 0, 0)

INSERT INTO Article(article_no, board_no, user_no, category_no, title, content, reg_date, hit_count, "group", step, "order") VALUES (seq_Article.nextVal, 3, 1, #{categoryNo}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, #{group}, #{step} + 1, #{order} + 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE Article SET title = '삭제된 게시물입니다.', content = 'ㅩ' WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}
UPDATE Article SET category_no = #{categoryNo}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_date = sysdate WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}
UPDATE Article SET hit_count = (hit_count + 1) WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Article WHERE board_no = 3

SELECT AAA.* FROM (SELECT Count(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT, AA.* FROM (SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY "group" DESC, step ASC) RNUM, article_no AS articleNo, board_no AS boardNo, article.user_no AS userNo, category_no AS categoryNo, title, content, reg_date AS regDate, hit_count AS hitCount, "group", step, "order" FROM article, users WHERE board_no = 3 AND (article.user_no = users.user_no)
WHERE AAA.rnum BETWEEN #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{end,jdbcType=INTEGER}

choose.when: WHERE board_no = 3 AND (Article.user_no = Users.user_no) AND Users.name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
choose.otherwise: WHERE board_no = 3 AND (Article.user_no = Users.user_no) AND ${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT AAA.* FROM (SELECT Count(*) over() AS TOTAL_COUNT, AA.* FROM (SELECT Row_number() over (ORDER BY "group" DESC, step ASC) RNUM, article_no AS articleNo, board_no AS boardNo, user_no AS userNo, category_no AS categoryNo, title, content, reg_date AS regDate, hit_count AS hitCount, "group", step, "order" FROM article WHERE board_no = 3) AA) AAA WHERE AAA.rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
